item.title: Kirloskar Electric Declines 8.30%: Valuation Reset and Bearish Momentum Shape Week
item.description: Kirloskar Electric Company Ltd experienced a challenging week, with its stock price declining by 8.30% from Rs.98.90 to Rs.90.69, sharply underperforming the Sensex which rose modestly by 0.39%. item.title: Hindustan Petroleum Falls 4.25%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
